p: Ethanolic extracts of saffron were prepared as 0.08 g/mL in 10% DMSO while standard drugs were dissolved in saline water (0.01 g/mL of 0.9% NaCl) and treated orally at 1 mL/100 g of mouse body weight. One optimal dose (800 mg/kg) showing maximum effect with no lethal consequences to mice was selected in this study, as reported previously [ 50].
